abstract: Throughout the weekend event in Omaha, known as Woodstock for Capitalists, there was a consistent whisper among some investors about Warren E. Buffett’s outspokenness.
snippet: Throughout the weekend event in Omaha, known as Woodstock for Capitalists, there was a consistent whisper among some investors about Warren E. Buffett’s outspokenness.
lead_paragraph: OMAHA — “When Charlie and I took this job, we did not agree to put our citizenship in a blind trust.”

headline.main: Reflecting on Buffett, Business and Politics
